summary: This Q&A report looks at how policies regarding the sexual orientation and gender identity of military service members have changed over time. LGBTQ+ individuals may now serve openly in the Coast Guard, and it is trying to provide an inclusive environment for these members. For example, Coast Guard started a voluntary diversity and inclusion education program. It also has a gender transition request policy which...
title: Coast Guard: Issues and Policies Related to Sexual Orientation and Gender Identity of Service Members
